channel.description: Recent content in Travel on eskild.blog

item.title: 3 Reasons to Visit the Eighth Continent, Madagascar
item.description: This is my attempt at writing at an exciting travel blog. I found writing this to be extremely fun and hope to write more about travel in the future. You’ve been itching to see a part of the world most people haven’t and you’re hoping to jump into some good ol’ fashion adventure. You’re not alone feeling that most places on this planet have become overrun with tourists. For better or for worse, this trend is here to stay.
